fill_info_to_build_cv: Fill in the information below to build your CV.
summary_placeholder: Briefly describe yourself, key skills, and career objectives...

template_selection_description: Select a template to start creating your CV. You can change it later.
select_download_format: Select your preferred download format and options.
explore_templates_create_cv: Explore our professional templates and create your perfect CV
our_mission_description: At CV Atelier, our mission is to empower job seekers by providing intuitive, high-quality tools to craft compelling resumes and CVs. We believe that everyone deserves the chance to present their best self to potential employers, and our platform is designed to make that process effortless and effective.
quality_description: We are committed to delivering top-notch templates and features that meet the highest standards of design and functionality.
simplicity_description: We believe in making complex tasks simple. Our user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and enjoyable CV creation experience.
innovation_description: We continuously explore new technologies and design trends to keep our templates fresh and our features cutting-edge.
support_description: Our dedicated support team is always ready to assist you, ensuring you have a seamless experience from start to finish.
contact_form_description: Have a question, feedback, or need support? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
subject: Subject
message_sent_successfully: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.

auth.subtitle: Professional Resume Atelier

hero.title: Craft Your Perfect Resume
hero.subtitle: with AI-Powered Precision
hero.description: Create stunning, professional resumes that stand out to employers. Our AI-powered platform helps you showcase your skills and experience in the best possible light.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Content
aiPowered.description: Let our AI help you write compelling descriptions and optimize your resume for applicant tracking systems.

downloadFormats.description: Download your resume in PDF, Word, or share it online with a custom link.
